solution_line_template: Rachel has {total_envelopes} - {first_hour_stuffed} - {second_hour_stuffed} envelopes = <<{total_envelopes}-{first_hour_stuffed}-{second_hour_stuffed}={envelopes_remaining}>>{envelopes_remaining} envelopes remaining to stuff.
Rachel has {total_hours} hours - {hours_passed} hours = <<{total_hours}-{hours_passed}={hours_remaining}>>{hours_remaining} hours left to finish the task.

Rachel needs to stuff {envelopes_remaining} envelopes / {hours_remaining} hours = <<{envelopes_remaining}/{hours_remaining}={envelopes_per_hour_needed}>>{envelopes_per_hour_needed} envelopes per hour.
